product_name: Isis Lucca Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Pack the Isis Lucca Tank Top for your next summer trip. It's got stretchy cotton to keep you comfy as you climb cobbled streets and sateen ribbon trim for elegance at the outdoor cafe. Cotton/modal/spandex fabric breathes nicely, maintains its shape and resists wrinkles so it's great for travel. Flattering scoop-neck design pairs well with a skirt. Straps on the Isis Lucca Tank Top are wide enough to cover bra straps. Closeout.
short_description: Pack the Isis Lucca Tank Top for your next summer trip. It's got stretchy cotton to keep you comfy as you climb cobbled streets and sateen ribbon trim for elegance at the outdoor cafe.
